p: Statistical characteristics of the six herb species suggested that their invasion was not synchronous. S. parviflora invaded the tundra earlier and, thus, it has time to establish with a stable distribution, which indicates a late invasion stage, and it has become a primary dominant species among the six herb species. Compared to S. parviflora, the distribution of C. angustifolia reflected a mid-stage of invasion, and S. tomentosa and G. baishanense were at an early invasion stage, which are starting to invade the tundra.
